high_descs: turn right and walk straight then turn left towards the garbage and look down
take the bottle out of the garbage can
turn right walk straight then turn left towards the sink then turn left towards the toilet
put the bottle on the top of the toilet
anns.task_desc: take the soap bottle out of the garbage and put it on the toilet

high_descs: Turn around and head to the red garbage can in between the white toilet and sink.
Grab the soap from the red garbage can.
Turn completely around until your are facing the white toilet.
Place the soap on top of the white toilet.
anns.task_desc: To remove the soap from the garbage and place it on top of the white toilet.

high_descs: Make a right to walk to the trash can next to the toilet.
Take the bottle of lotion out of the trash can.
Turn right left to face the toilet.
Put the bottle of lotion down the lid of the toilet tank.
anns.task_desc: Move a bottle of lotion from the trash to the toilet tank lid.
